message.content: Search in c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\src\content\products\ for any JSON files related to bare copper cables ("cable de cobre desnudo", "cobre desnudo", "CCD", "CAM", "cable"). Read the content of any matching files. Also check if there are any products with "cable" in their title or description by searching the JSON files.

content.text:
Perfect! I found the copper cable products in your catalog. Here's a summary of the bare copper cable-related products:

## Copper Cable Products Found

### 1. **Cable de Cobre Desnudo (CCD-001)**
- **SKU:** CCD-001
- **Category:** Accesorios (Accessories)
- **Description:** Bare twisted copper cable for earthing systems. High-purity electrolytic copper conductor, flexible and corrosion-resistant. Available in 7, 19, 37 and 61-strand configurations covering 8 AWG to 750 MCM.
- **Key Features:**
  - High-purity electrolytic copper (Cu-ETP)
  - 4 strand configurations: 7, 19, 37, and 61 strands
  - Gauge range: 8 AWG to 750 MCM
  - Uninsulated conductor for earthing
  - Compatible with exothermic welding and mechanical connectors
  - Complies with ASTM B8 standard
  - Applications: Earthing systems, grids, lightning protection conductors

- **12 Size Variants:** Includes sizes from N°8 AWG (7 strands) through 750 MCM (61 strands), organized by strand configuration groups

**File Location:** `/src/content/products/ccd-001.json`

### 2. **Fleje de Cobre para Malla de Tierra (FLC-001)** 
- **SKU:** FLC-001
- **Category:** Accesorios (Accessories)
- **Description:** Electrolytic copper flat strap (braid) for building earthing grids. Flat copper conductor for high conductivity that forms a grid pattern on the ground, with exothermic welds at each crossing point.
- **Key Features:**
  - UNS C11000 electrolytic copper (high purity)
  - Flexible flat strap for grid laying
  - 13 size variants available
  - Thickness range: 1/8" to 1/2"
  - Width range: 1" to 3"
  - Compatible with graphite molds (types B, C, E)
  - Ideal for electrical rooms, substations, data centers

- **13 Size Variants:** Ranging from 1/8" x 1" through 1/2" x 2", organized by thickness groups

**File Location:** `/src/content/products/flc-001.json`

### 3. **Camarilla de Registro PVC Naranja (CAM-001)**
- **SKU:** CAM-001
- **Category:** Accesorios (Accessories)
- **Description:** Orange PVC inspection chamber for earthing systems. Provides a future inspection and measurement point for the system. Complies with RIC N°06 article 5.15 which requires an accessible measurement point for all earthing systems.
- **File Location:** `/src/content/products/cam-001.json`

All three products are in the **Accesorios (Accessories)** category and are currently in stock. CCD-001 and FLC-001 are copper conductor products for grounding/earthing applications, while CAM-001 is an accessory for inspection purposes.
